template.title: IBM PCjr, i8088 4.77Mhz, 512KB RAM, CGA Plus, 3-voice sound, ~1984 (Booter)
template.full-configuration:
[sdl] fullscreen=false fulldouble=false fullresolution=original windowresolution=original output=surface autolock=true sensitivity=100 waitonerror=true priority=higher,normal mapperfile=mapper-0.74.map usescancodes=true
[dosbox] language= machine=pcjr captures=capture memsize=16
[render] frameskip=0 aspect=false scaler=normal2x
[cpu] core=auto cputype=auto cycles=120 cycleup=10 cycledown=20
[mixer] nosound=false rate=44100 blocksize=1024 prebuffer=20
[midi] mpu401=none mididevice=none midiconfig=
[sblaster] sbtype=none sbbase=220 irq=7 dma=1 hdma=5 sbmixer=false oplmode=auto oplemu=default oplrate=44100
[gus] gus=false gusrate=44100 gusbase=240 gusirq=5 gusdma=3 ultradir=C:\ULTRASND
[speaker] pcspeaker=true pcrate=44100 tandy=auto tandyrate=44100 disney=false
[joystick] joysticktype=auto timed=true autofire=false swap34=false buttonwrap=false
[serial] serial1=dummy serial2=dummy serial3=disabled serial4=disabled
[dos] xms=false ems=false umb=false keyboardlayout=auto
[ipx] ipx=false
[autoexec] boot \file exit
template.incremental-configuration:
[dosbox] machine=pcjr
[cpu] cycles=120
[midi] mpu401=none mididevice=none
[sblaster] sbtype=none sbmixer=false
[speaker] disney=false
[dos] xms=false ems=false umb=false
[autoexec] boot \file exit
